messages.content:
Categorize this IT Ticket:

enquiry new pas data is not stable forecast for november and december could affect the project and account sent wednesday november enquiry data stable forecast for november december could affect importance high dear you aware if there any updates operation respect data lost updates form yesterday today for november december thank you best regards agile manager next annual leave november december
